A1.label: Beginner
A1.description: Ability to understand simple sentences and respond to concrete needs.

A2.label: Elementary
A2.description: Ability to communicate on familiar everyday topics.

B1.label: Intermediate
B1.description: Ability to understand common topics and express opinions.

B2.label: Advanced
B2.description: Ability to argue and interact fluently.

C1.label: Proficient
C1.description: Ability to understand complex texts and express yourself fluently.

C2.label: Mastery
C2.description: Ability to use the language expertly.
